attributes.action: Introduce legislation to ensure detailed feedback is given to all job applicants regardless of the success of their application.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Unfortunately, after careful consideration we regret to inform you that we are unable to progress your application further or provide you with more detailed feedback."

The above is a typical response from a UK company after a failed job application. This shows such utter contempt for the applicant that I think this kind of behaviour should be stopped immediately. 

A job applicant should be told in detail and in writing exactly why they are not successful, in the very least it would stop companies hiding  their discriminatory practices behind such vague responses.
